effect.minecraft.bad_omen.desc: Entering a village area causes mayhem
effect.minecraft.blindness.desc: Hampered, short vision and partial slowness
effect.minecraft.conduit_power.desc: Infinite oxygen, improved vision and mining speed while underwater
effect.minecraft.glowing.desc: The affected becomes visible through walls
effect.minecraft.hero_of_the_village.des: Trading benefits and random gifts from nearby villagers
effect.minecraft.infested.desc: The affected has a low chance of spawning silverfish when hurt
effect.minecraft.invisibility.desc: The body of the affected becomes invisible
effect.minecraft.levitation.desc: The affected flies upwards against their will
effect.minecraft.luck.desc: Improved luck in some circumstances, primarily fishing
effect.minecraft.oozing.desc: The affected spawns slimes upon death
effect.minecraft.poison.desc: Significantly damages the affected over time, but does not kill
effect.minecraft.regeneration.desc: Slowly heals the affected over time
effect.minecraft.resistance.desc: Substantial resistance to damage from all sources
effect.minecraft.slow_falling.desc: The effects of gravity are reduced
effect.minecraft.slowness.desc: Significantly decreased movement speed on ground
effect.minecraft.speed.desc: Greater movement speed while on ground
effect.minecraft.unluck.desc: Bad luck in some circumstances, primarily fishing
effect.minecraft.weaving.desc: The affected spawns cobwebs upon death
effect.minecraft.wind_charged.desc: The affected emits a burst of wind upon death
effect.minecraft.wither.desc: Applies damage to the affected over time
enchantment.minecraft.bane_of_arthropods: Increased damage to arthropods like Spiders and Bees
enchantment.minecraft.binding_curse.desc: The cursed item cannot be removed from an armor slot anymore
enchantment.minecraft.blast_protection.d: High resistance to explosions and fireworks
enchantment.minecraft.breach.desc: Reduces the effectiveness of the target's armor
enchantment.minecraft.channeling.desc: The Trident will summon a Lightning Bolt on impact, given this happens during a Thunderstorm
enchantment.minecraft.density.desc: Increases damage the higher you fall
enchantment.minecraft.feather_falling.de: Reduced fall and Ender Pearl damage
enchantment.minecraft.fire_protection.de: High resistance to fire damage and reduced burn time if you're set ablaze
enchantment.minecraft.flame.desc: Sets arrows and enemies shot with the Bow on fire
enchantment.minecraft.fortune.desc: Ores and crops have a chance to drop more items when mined
enchantment.minecraft.frost_walker.desc: Water under your feet temporarily turns into Ice
enchantment.minecraft.impaling.desc: Increased damage when the Trident is used to attack an Aquatic Mob
enchantment.minecraft.infinity.desc: Allows the Bow to shoot infinite normal arrows, given you have at least a single one present
enchantment.minecraft.looting.desc: Better chance to get rare loot and overall increased loot output
enchantment.minecraft.loyalty.desc: The Trident will return to you after being thrown
enchantment.minecraft.luck_of_the_sea.de: Rare loot is more common and common loot more rare when fishing
enchantment.minecraft.lure.desc: Fish will bite the hook more quickly
enchantment.minecraft.mending.desc: The enchanted item can be repaired by picking up experience orbs
enchantment.minecraft.multishot.desc: A single shot will fire multiple arrows from the Crossbow
enchantment.minecraft.piercing.desc: Arrows fired from the Crossbow will pierce through multiple enemies at once
enchantment.minecraft.power.desc: Arrows fired from the Bow deal more damage
enchantment.minecraft.protection.desc: Moderate damage resistance to most sources
enchantment.minecraft.punch.desc: Arrows fired from the Bow punch enemies farther
enchantment.minecraft.quick_charge.desc: Decreased charge time for the Crossbow
enchantment.minecraft.respiration.desc: Improved underwater breathing time and vision
enchantment.minecraft.riptide.desc: Allows the Trident to launch you when standing in rain or water
enchantment.minecraft.silk_touch.desc: Certain blocks like Glass or Iron Ore drop themselves when mined
enchantment.minecraft.soul_speed.desc: Greater walking speed on Soul Sand and Soul Soil
enchantment.minecraft.sweeping_edge.desc: Increased damage to enemies caught in the sweeping attack of a sword
enchantment.minecraft.thorns.desc: Getting attacked has a chance to deal damage to the enemy
enchantment.minecraft.unbreaking.desc: Lower durability cost when using the item
enchantment.minecraft.vanishing_curse.de: The cursed item will disappear when you die
enchantment.minecraft.wind_burst.desc: Landing a successful smash will fling you into the air
text.idwtialsimmoedm.config.field.displa: display only when shift is held
text.idwtialsimmoedm.config.title: idwtialsimmoedm configuration
